relationships.description: Harry had someone outside Hogwarts who cared what happened to him, almost like a parent.
Dumbledore was consoling Harry about the loss of Sirius.
Sirius had an influence on Harry, as he wouldn't have wanted Harry to shut himself away or crack up.
Madam Bones is mentioned as an example of someone who has passed away.
